name: Connect 4 (itch) (Mathurin)
description:
Hey, do you want to chill by playing this little connect 4 game ?

Play against the AI or a friend.

Here you are, a simple click, 3Mb file, unzip and double click that connect4.exe !

You can mute/unmute the ingame sound effects by pressing 'm' on your keyboard.

Have fun !

Provided to you by Mathurin Deramecourt.
